return 0.0



    def format_eta(self) -> str:

        if self.eta_known:

            t = int(self.eta)

            seconds = t % 60

            t //= 60

            minutes = t % 60

            t //= 60

            hours = t % 24

            t //= 24

            if t > 0:

                return f"{t}d {hours:02}:{minutes:02}:{seconds:02}"

            else:

                return f"{hours:02}:{minutes:02}:{seconds:02}"

        return ""
